overview: Have you ever gone on a trip anywhere? In-Ah has taken a flight everyday but she hasn’t been on a journey. Kang-Il has works for the airport but he’s never gotten on a plane.One day, In-Ah has something stolen and Kang-Il chases after the thief. Later, they meet a mysterious old woman. The old woman doesn’t know anything about them. It is then that they start their weird journey together. What kind of fate will they have?
title: Incheon Waltz, The Community Musical
